documents.document: The words President Trump still make me vomit in my mouth a little.
'I reckon he's a homo that bloody cat'- #1 Christmas Quote
@joshgwal What, who
So who won lotto??
Am I the only one sick enough to be wishing for a laser beam to appear on Trump's forehead? #bang
I've learnt many things this election - mainly that I want to marry Van Jones
America you fucking retards.
@_Feeebz_ come and hang out
@LucieRL ahaha I was thinking about a camo back pack!
I'm watching a man cry about pottery on my Saturday night. What are YOU Up to?? âš±ï¸ðŸº
I think Trump deserves to be 'bragadocious' about his linguistic prowess.
I've been watching this debate for 5 seconds and I want to cut out Trump's tongue. Good luck with your free speech then Sir.
Trump is stuck in the 1700s, a wife is not a slave to her husband's decisions. Clinton is her own politician, accountable to her own actions
Can Trump stop yelling please?
There should be tamagotchis with humans instead of pets for people who want kids but aren't quite responsible yet.
@joshgwal I read this as Star Wars and wondered if you'd had a stroke
Struggling with what to do when someone tells you you look 'like you didn't enjoy high school'? Ask @full_theo, he's a seasoned pro.
My fav part of this weekend was when a stranger told me I looked like Moaning Myrtle.
Does mound diaspora eventually work it's way out of your lungs? #NZflatquestions
Are my clothes damp or just cold? #questionsfromanNZflat
@LucieRL you are all good. Graduation is not far friend!
@LucieRL um what
I saw 3 men over 50 years old catching Pokemon in Cornwall Park this afternoon. Pokemon Go is officially dead.
@full_theo the same way you wash a sieve. Dunk it and run.
Netflix isn't working and it's Sunday and I don't know what to do.
@joshgwal I think the real issue here is: does your brother-in-law ever wear anything but polar fleece camo?
@emmastanford11 is it cause staff will need comfort food after survey results tomorrow? ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥
@_Feeebz_ good thing I know you're talking about skydiving, because that has potential to be a prostitute's work schedule

Pokemon Go has given me 100% more appreciation of my Defensive Driving course.

@emmastanford11 come out after werk
I think the real surprise here is just how good looking the Welsh are. Ewes looking sharp eh.
@joshgwal Ahhh this makes sense! That's cool!
@joshgwal you have a vegan friend that isn't me
Feeling equal amounts of respect and disdain for that Crusader with the flowing curly mullet.
@joshgwal I just googled that fuck
@joshgwal what's your new job??
I would totally support songs at NZ sports games if I hadn't heard 'Baz' butcher Wagon Wheel one too many times at the local karaoke.
Whoever thinks booing is acceptable at sports games need to reconsider the concept of sportsmanship.
@joshgwal nah cuz they'd sweat too! It's all sweaty
@joshgwal that's my ideal date. You don't have to talk to them and they'll probably let me win.
Did Suzy Cato just step through a time warp from the 90s?? She looks exactly the same, minus the rainbow jumper
@empizzz can I swear on your show?
@empizzz next time just call me. I can chat shit for you haha
@empizzz haha I would have called in
@joshgwal well kind of... I work at MediaWorks which is in charge of Bravo
@joshgwal I'll get the content team onto it
@joshgwal holy shit that's not LED lights is it?? It's so beautiful!
My first work function involved free champagne, free food and freedom to take the piss out of some excellent NZ 'talent'
@PhilippaxO haha oh my god thank goodness. I was in tears this morning thinking I was thousand of dollars is debt!
ACC trying to tell me I owe them $2000 because apparently I'm a self-employed full timer. Don't think so mate.
Next time I'm ordering at a cafe someone remind me that I'm lactose intolerant. #nocheeseplease
Should we send the SAS to fight ISIL isn't a question, they're most likely already there.
It's like Ponsonby tries really hard to be Wellington but ends up giving in to its inevitable pretentious ponce.
@joshgwal or next pay day...
@PhilippaxO unfortunately yes
@joshgwal I start on Wednesday!
@BuZzPuMpA @MelissaaaNZ it's basically just updating websites, data and putting together sales briefs and branding ðŸ¤—
@MelissaaaNZ yes! At MediaWorks!
@joshgwal it's coconut that's dried or fried with spices to make it smokey, crispy and delicious.
@brendanhaddock yeah you can! There was a stall with it at the Go Green Expo, I can't remember where it was stocked though...
The first thing I'm going to buy with my pay check is some coconut bacon. Because real job=real adulting.
Thank god most prospective employers don't call for the ability to parallel park, I'd be a life-long beneficiary.
So in the midst of an obesity crisis McDonald's releases 'the Grand Mac'. Their business ethics know no bounds.
I can't stop watching Vikings. I don't want a job anymore, I just want to become a Viking. Without the raping/pillaging. Mainly for the hair
@LucieRL Yeah, but it means I can't tell employers that I've graduated, it's so annoying. But WHAAT workshop??
@LucieRL because the deadline for May was the 1st of March, even though they told me my German exchange wouldn't effect my graduation
VicAbroad is the worst. Thank you for delaying my graduation for 6 months without informing me and not getting back to my emails.
@emmastanford11 @hacademic inside. inside the speech marks.
I would like a job now please. I have a degree and I'm really good at work I promise.
I lie, there is nothing less attractive than a man eating a soft serve with a flake.
There is nothing less attractive than a man eating a soft serve.
@joshgwal hahaha I was telling my Mum about how you do this every year and she cracked up
@_Feeebz_ then you are missing out friend
No. There is not a League player called Johnny Raper. That is unfortunate.
Why do we call it Dutch when it's from the Netherlands which we also mistakenly call Holland? Why, English, why?
Trying to understand Dutch is like being really, really stoned and thinking you're in a topsy-turvy Germany.
My life consists of forgetting passwords and being continually locked out of the internet.
According to my Granddad 'chicken is not meat'. I hope everyone hears that. Because you're all wrong.
I could never live in Camden excuse I think I would literally turn into a food truck. Or a taco. A delicious taco. ðŸ´ðŸ¹
Today one of my finger's went blue and I didn't care. That's how much I love London.
@_Feeebz_ what.
@joshgwal hahaha, this is a little more fun/scary. They have masks and horns and beer.
@joshgwal and that right there is the point my lovely.
Beating drums and chanting people outside my building at 6:30 in the morning. Fasnacht is here and it's wild. #karnival
@emmastanford11 God you're so mysterious
I don't want to be a dickhead who takes Buzzfeed quizzes but I kind of want to know what my Patronus is.
I just received an honorary doctorate from AirNZ. Dr Megan Leach will be flying back to New Zealand on the 17th of March.
I can now understand the German Spotify adverts. I think this means I'm fluent.
Why are there not more public rubbish bins in Europe?? Wind farms are great but you can't put your gum wrapper in them can you?
Never trust someone who litters.
@joshgwal haha because you're too quick and you're ALWAYS online to see mistakes
It's currently -9 in Berlin and I don't have a face anymore.
'My Mum had white wine and we were having a fucking roast, she's gone mad!'- ex-pat Englishman problems in Berlin
As a 31 year old man I don't recommend putting 'children, alternative lifestyles and photographics' as your top 3 interests on Couchsurfing.
When you break up with your boyfriend and all your passwords become your Mum's name.
On the phone to Mum, 'Wow, have you put on some weight?'. Merry Christmas.
I have a feeling that 'going skiing' is synonymous with 'potentially dying'. Pray for me.
Does anyone want to give me a well-paying job that gives me lots of holidays and means I can stay in Europe 5eva?
